item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, October 16, 2024 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:

23. Life expectancy rise in rich countries slows down: took 30 years to prove (139 points | 291 comments)

25. The Sundial Cannon of Åtvidaberg (2017) (48 points | 21 comments)
26. Big advance on simple-sounding math problem was a century in the making (101 points | 27 comments)
27. The richest people borrow against their stock (2021) (77 points | 163 comments)
